mapper.insert: insert into product (PROD_NO, CATE_NUM, PROD_NAME, PROD_PRICE, PROD_INFO, PROD_IMG, EMP_NO) values (#{prodNo}, #{cateNum}, #{prodName}, #{prodPrice}, #{prodInfo}, #{prodImage}, #{empNo})
mapper.select: select PROD_NO prodNo, CATE_NUM cateNum, PROD_NAME prodName, PROD_PRICE prodPrice, PROD_INFO prodInfo, PROD_IMG prodImage, EMP_NO empNo from product where PROD_NO = #{prodNo}
select CATE_NUM cateNum, CATE_KIND cateKind, CATE_NAME cateName from category
select PROD_NO prodNo, CATE_NUM cateNum, PROD_NAME prodName, PROD_PRICE prodPrice, PROD_INFO prodInfo, PROD_IMG prodImage, EMP_NO empNo from product
